Five ''Minecraft''-inspired {{w|Xbox system software#Xbox 360 system software|dashboard}} '''themes''' were available for purchase on the {{w|Xbox 360}} Marketplace, each costing {{price|2.99}} (originally {{microsoft point|420}}). Additionally, a Wood theme could be obtained as a [[Xbox 360 Edition#Awards and unlockables|free award]] for uploading a screenshot to Facebook.

== Free award ==
{| class="wikitable"
! Title !! Official description !! Unlock requirement
|-
| '''Minecraft Wood Theme'''
| ''Well done, enjoy this little theme with our compliments!''
| Share a picture on Facebook. This theme became unobtainable when the Facebook upload feature was removed.
|}

== List of purchasable themes ==
These themes can no longer be purchased due to the closure of the Xbox 360 Marketplace.<ref>[https://support.xbox.com/en-US/help/xbox-360/store/xbox-360-marketplace-update Xbox 360 Store and Xbox 360 Marketplace FAQ | Xbox Support]</ref> They can, however, still be re-downloaded and used if purchased before the closure.

{| class="wikitable"
! Title !! Official description !! Release date<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20240422051558/https://marketplace.xbox.com/en-US/Product/Minecraft-Xbox-360-Edition/66acd000-77fe-1000-9115-d802584111f7?DownloadType=Theme#LiveZone</ref> !! Ref.
|-
| '''Minecraft Iron Theme'''
| ''Smarten up your dashboard and be the envy of your friends with this magnificient Minecraft theme!''
| April 24, 2012
| [https://web.archive.org/web/20240422051558/https://marketplace.xbox.com/en-US/Product/Minecraft-Iron-Theme/86d1557e-3ca5-4de9-b4c6-a813d81711d8]
|-
| '''Minecraft Stone Theme'''
| ''It's the Minecraft Stone Theme with dancing Zombies and more!''
| July 4, 2012
| [https://web.archive.org/web/20240422052630/https://marketplace.xbox.com/en-US/Product/Minecraft-Stone-Theme/b92ef8a5-f1bc-48b6-adb7-97b4e11e65ab]
|-
| '''Minecraft Gold Theme'''
| ''The first Minecraft theme to feature Enderman, Iron fences, Vines, Stone Bricks and more new items!''
| September 26, 2012
| [https://web.archive.org/web/20240422052629/https://marketplace.xbox.com/en-US/Product/Minecraft-Gold-Theme/fe2f874c-fd86-4fac-a38e-2319619c1b28]
|-
| '''Minecraft Diamond Theme'''
| ''An all-action Minecraft theme featuring the Enderdragon, Snow Golems, Blaze, Magma Cubes and of course diamonds!''
| November 29, 2012
| [https://web.archive.org/web/20240422052631/https://marketplace.xbox.com/en-US/Product/Minecraft-Diamond-Theme/a7c37f20-8044-468c-ba68-7716e44b9fb4]
|-
| '''Around the World Theme'''
| ''Wondrous places as you have never seen them before!''
| June 12, 2013
| [https://web.archive.org/web/20240422052631/https://marketplace.xbox.com/en-US/Product/Around-the-World-Theme/1ebb57bf-4a2d-4e30-bf94-5cefe055b398]
|}
